info.title: Strava
info.description: This is a connector for the Strava API, Strava is a service for tracking human exercise which incorporates social network features. It is mostly used for cycling and running using GPS data. The connector gives you the opportunity to get your activities/clubs and other information from Strava.

get.description: Returns the activity stats of an athlete. Only includes data from activities set to Everyone visibility.

biggest_ride_distance.description: The longest distance ridden by the athlete.

biggest_climb_elevation_gain.description: The highest climb ridden by the athlete.

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated athlete. Tokens with profile:read_all scope will receive a detailed athlete representation; all others will receive a summary representation.

id.description: The unique identifier of the athlete

state.description: The athlete's state or geographical region.

sex.description: The athlete's sex. May take one of the following values: M, F

summit.description: Whether the athlete has any Summit subscription.

created_at.description: The time at which the athlete was created.

updated_at.description: The time at which the athlete was last updated.

profile_medium.description: URL to a 62x62 pixel profile picture.

profile.description: URL to a 124x124 pixel profile picture.

measurement_preference.description: The athlete's preferred unit system. May take one of the following values: feet, meters

get.description: Returns the activities of an athlete for a specific identifier. Requires activity:read. Only Me activities will be filtered out unless requested by a token with activity:read_all.

parameters.description: An epoch timestamp(the number of seconds since 1 January 1970) to use for filtering activities that have taken place before a certain time.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: An epoch timestamp(the number of seconds since 1 January 1970) to use for filtering activities that have taken place after a certain time.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns a list of the clubs whose membership includes the authenticated athlete.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns the specified segment. read_all scope required in order to retrieve athlete-specific segment information, or to retrieve private segments.
List of the authenticated athlete's starred segments. Private segments are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.
Returns the laps of an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.
Returns the comments on the given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

id.description: The unique identifier of this comment

activity_id.description: The identifier of the activity this comment is related to

created_at.description: The time at which this comment was created.

get.description: Returns the athletes who kudoed an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns a given club using its identifier.
Returns a list of the athletes who are members of a given club.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns a list of the administrators of a given club.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Retrieve recent activities from members of a specific club. The authenticated athlete must belong to the requested club in order to hit this endpoint. Pagination is supported. Athlete profile visibility is respected for all activities.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity

external_id.description: The identifier provided at upload time

upload_id.description: The identifier of the upload that resulted in this activity

moving_time.description: The activity's moving time, in seconds

elapsed_time.description: The activity's elapsed time, in seconds

type.description: An enumeration of the types an activity may have.

start_date.description: The time at which the activity was started.

start_date_local.description: The time at which the activity was started in the local timezone.

start_latlng.description: A collection of float objects. A pair of latitude/longitude coordinates, represented as an array of 2 floating point numbers.

end_latlng.description: A collection of float objects. A pair of latitude/longitude coordinates, represented as an array of 2 floating point numbers.

achievement_count.description: The number of achievements gained during this activity

kudos_count.description: The number of kudos given for this activity

comment_count.description: The number of comments for this activity

athlete_count.description: The number of athletes for taking part in a group activity

photo_count.description: The number of Instagram photos for this activity

polyline.description: The polyline of the map, only returned on detailed representation of an object

summary_polyline.description: The summary polyline of the map

trainer.description: Whether this activity was recorded on a training machine

commute.description: Whether this activity is a commute

manual.description: Whether this activity was created manually

gear_id.description: The id of the gear for the activity

average_speed.description: The activity's average speed, in meters per second

max_speed.description: The activity's max speed, in meters per second

average_watts.description: Average power output in watts during this activity. Rides only

weighted_average_watts.description: Similar to Normalized Power. Rides with power meter data only

device_watts.description: Whether the watts are from a power meter, false if estimated

max_watts.description: Rides with power meter data only

elev_high.description: The activity's highest elevation, in meters

elev_low.description: The activity's lowest elevation, in meters

total_photo_count.description: The number of Instagram and Strava photos for this activity

has_kudoed.description: Whether the logged-in athlete has kudoed this activity

calories.description: The number of kilocalories consumed during this activity

start_date.description: The time at which the effort was started.

start_date_local.description: The time at which the effort was started in the local timezone.

start_index.description: The start index of this effort in its activity's stream

end_index.description: The end index of this effort in its activity's stream

device_watts.description: For riding efforts, whether the wattage was reported by a dedicated recording device

average_watts.description: The average wattage of this effort

kom_rank.description: The rank of the effort on the global leaderboard if it belongs in the top 10 at the time of upload

pr_rank.description: The rank of the effort on the athlete's leaderboard if it belongs in the top 3 at the time of upload

distance.description: The distance of this split, in meters

elapsed_time.description: The elapsed time of this split, in seconds

elevation_difference.description: The elevation difference of this split, in meters

moving_time.description: The moving time of this split, in seconds

average_speed.description: The average speed of this split, in meters per second

pace_zone.description: The pacing zone of this split

splits_metric.description: The splits metric of the Activity

device_name.description: The name of the device used to record the activity

embed_token.description: The token used to embed a Strava activity

profile_medium.description: URL to a 60x60 pixel profile picture.

cover_photo.description: URL to a ~1185x580 pixel cover photo.

cover_photo_small.description: URL to a ~360x176 pixel cover photo.

activity_types.description: The activity types that count for a club. This takes precedence over sport_type.

featured.description: Whether the club is featured or not.

verified.description: Whether the club is verified or not.

membership.description: The membership status of the logged-in athlete. May take one of the following values: member, pending

admin.description: Whether the currently logged-in athlete is an administrator of this club.

owner.description: Whether the currently logged-in athlete is the owner of this club.

following_count.description: The number of athletes in the club that the logged-in athlete follows.

id.description: The unique identifier of the athlete
The unique identifier of this lap

athlete.description: The summary of the related athlete

elapsed_time.description: The lap's elapsed time, in seconds

moving_time.description: The lap's moving time, in seconds

start_date.description: The time at which the lap was started.

start_date_local.description: The time at which the lap was started in the local timezone.

start_index.description: The start index of this effort in its activity's stream

end_index.description: The end index of this effort in its activity's stream

total_elevation_gain.description: The elevation gain of this lap, in meters

max_speed.description: The maximum speed of this lap, in meters per second

lap_index.description: The index of this lap in the activity it belongs to

moving_time.description: The activity's moving time, in seconds

elapsed_time.description: The activity's elapsed time, in seconds

type.description: An enumeration of the types an activity may have.

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity

external_id.description: The identifier provided at upload time

upload_id.description: The identifier of the upload that resulted in this activity

start_date.description: The time at which the activity was started.

start_date_local.description: The time at which the activity was started in the local timezone.

achievement_count.description: The number of achievements gained during this activity

kudos_count.description: The number of kudos given for this activity

comment_count.description: The number of comments for this activity

athlete_count.description: The number of athletes for taking part in a group activity

photo_count.description: The number of Instagram photos for this activity

summary_polyline.description: The summary polyline of the map

polyline.description: The polyline of the map, only returned on detailed representation of an object

trainer.description: Whether this activity was recorded on a training machine

commute.description: Whether this activity is a commute

manual.description: Whether this activity was created manually

gear_id.description: The id of the gear for the activity

average_speed.description: The activity's average speed, in meters per second

max_speed.description: The activity's max speed, in meters per second

average_watts.description: Average power output in watts during this activity. Rides only

weighted_average_watts.description: Similar to Normalized Power. Rides with power meter data only

kilojoules.description: The total work done in kilojoules during this activity. Rides only

device_watts.description: Whether the watts are from a power meter, false if estimated

has_heartrate.description: Whether the activity has heartrate data

total_photo_count.description: The number of Instagram and Strava photos for this activity

has_kudoed.description: Whether the logged-in athlete has kudoed this activity

id.description: The unique identifier of this segment

activity_type.description: May take one of the following values: Ride, Run

average_grade.description: The segment's average grade, in percents

maximum_grade.description: The segments's maximum grade, in percents

elevation_high.description: The segments's highest elevation, in meters

elevation_low.description: The segments's lowest elevation, in meters

start_latlng.description: Start collection of float objects. A pair of latitude/longitude coordinates, represented as an array of 2 floating point numbers.

end_latlng.description: End collection of float objects. A pair of latitude/longitude coordinates, represented as an array of 2 floating point numbers.

climb_category.description: The category of the climb [0, 5]. Higher is harder ie. 5 is Hors categorie, 0 is uncategorized in climb_category.

state.description: The segments's state or geographical region.

id.description: The unique identifier of this segment

activity_type.description: May take one of the following values: Ride, Run

average_grade.description: The segment's average grade, in percents

maximum_grade.description: The segments's maximum grade, in percents

elevation_high.description: The segments's highest elevation, in meters

elevation_low.description: The segments's lowest elevation, in meters

climb_category.description: The category of the climb [0, 5]. Higher is harder ie. 5 is Hors catgorie, 0 is uncategorized in climb_category.

state.description: The segments's state or geographical region.

hazardous.description: Whether this segment is considered hazardous

created_at.description: The time at which the segment was created.

updated_at.description: The time at which the segment was last updated.

polyline.description: The polyline of the map, only returned on detailed representation of an object

summary_polyline.description: The summary polyline of the map

effort_count.description: The total number of efforts for this segment

athlete_count.description: The number of unique athletes who have an effort for this segment

star_count.description: The number of stars for this segment

pr_activity_id.description: The unique identifier of the activity related to the PR effort.

pr_elapsed_time.description: The elapsed time ot the PR effort.

pr_date.description: The time at which the PR effort was started.

effort_count.description: Number of efforts by the authenticated athlete on this segment.

count.description: The number of activities considered in this total.

distance.description: he total distance covered by the considered activities.

moving_time.description: The total moving time of the considered activities.

elapsed_time.description: The total elapsed time of the considered activities.

elevation_gain.description: The total elevation gain of the considered activities.

achievement_count.description: The total number of achievements of the considered activities.

count.description: The number of activities considered in this total.

distance.description: he total distance covered by the considered activities.

moving_time.description: The total moving time of the considered activities.

elapsed_time.description: The total elapsed time of the considered activities.

elevation_gain.description: The total elevation gain of the considered activities.

primary.description: Whether this bike is the owner's default one.

resource_state.description: Resource state, indicates level of detail. Possible values: 2 -> summary, 3 -> detail

distance.description: The distance logged with this bike.

primary.description: Whether this shoes is the owner's default one.

resource_state.description: Resource state, indicates level of detail. Possible values: 2 -> summary, 3 -> detail

distance.description: The distance logged with this shoe.

primary.description: Whether this gear's is the owner's default one.

resource_state.description: Resource state, indicates level of detail. Possible values: 2 -> summary, 3 -> detail

distance.description: The distance logged with this gear.
